title: Git
details: A distributed version control system used for tracking changes in source code and facilitating collaborative development.

title: Docker
details: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in isolated containers for consistency and scalability.

title: NGINX
details: A high-performance web server and reverse proxy used for serving content and load balancing.

title: SSH (OpenSSH)
details: A protocol for securely connecting to remote servers and executing commands over encrypted channels.

title: Postman
details: A tool for testing APIs by sending HTTP requests and analyzing responses in a user-friendly interface.

title: Kubernetes (kubectl)
details: CLI tool used to deploy, inspect, and manage containerized applications in Kubernetes clusters.
source: Used for container orchestration in backend and deployment workflows
